articles.title: Asiana Pilots Union formed
articles.content:
Asiana Pilots Union formed 
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Asiana Pilots Union of South Korea was formed, according to Seoul-based Radio No. 1.
 The pilots have not been associated to any trade union due to the authorities' disallowance. but through a court struggle they won the right to form their union.

Preparatory committee for solidarity struggle inaugurated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Preparatory committee for solidarity struggle inaugurated in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for 2001 winter solidarity struggle of workers, the poor and students was inaugurated in South Korea on January 12 with due ceremony, Seoul-based MBC reported.
 Stating that the authorities were giving priority to restructuring to threaten the people's right to existence,  the committee demanded measures for vital right.

Authorities' step to shelve development plan protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' step to shelve development plan protested in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The committee for the promotion of the development of Phankyo district, Kyonggi Province, held a meeting with the attendance of at least 600 people on Jan. 12 in protest against the step taken by the authorities to shelve the plan to develop this district, according to Seoul-based MBC. 
 The committee at the meeting urged the authorities to meet their demand, charging that they cheated the inhabitants by breaking their promise to decide on the development till the end of last year and lift the restriction on permitting the construction project.

articles.title: War exercises staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
War exercises staged in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The South Korean army "Metropolitan Defence Command" announced that it would conduct the coldest season tactical drill and march for using blank shells in the areas around Seoul between Jan. 15 and 20, according to "Yonhap News" from Seoul (internet).
 Tank drills will reportedly be staged in the heart of Seoul and the area adjacent to it at the dawn of Jan. 16 and 20.    
 The South Korean military authorities are staging such war exercises at a time when voices calling for supporting and implementing the June 15 north-south joint declaration are growing stronger.

articles.content:
SPA chairman meets Cuban ambassador 
    Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and conversed with Cuban ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Inclan Embade at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today who paid a farewell visit to him.
